results.content: Covers material in great detail, but speed is a bit too slow. Some of the test questions cannot be answered because the material is covered in a later chapter - that is annoying because I thought it was my mistake because I missed an important part of the lecture. Also some test questions are asked multiple times within the same test.
results.content_html: Covers material in great detail, but speed is a bit too slow. Some of the test questions cannot be answered because the material is covered in a later chapter - that is annoying because I thought it was my mistake because I missed an important part of the lecture. Also some test questions are asked multiple times within the same test.

results.content: Good comprehensive content but supporting documentation is basic at best.  Also, locks down video (DRM) so no screen shots or notes can be generated during the course.  I now will sign up for another Udemy,  Pluralsight, CloudGuru class or maybe retake this 30 hours course in segments based on test performances -- and generate notes as I go along again.
results.content_html: Good comprehensive content but supporting documentation is basic at best. Also, locks down video (DRM) so no screen shots or notes can be generated during the course. results.content: I have learned a lot of new topics and concepts, Zeal Vora is a great instructor, I really recommend this training 100% percent, It is a production environmental focus training, I hope Zeal continue creating AWS great material like this training, thanks Zeal!

results.content: Good course. Very thorough. If you've passed other pro-level AWS exams a lot of it will be remedial. Granted, you kind of need to go through every video to get all the tips for the exam. Def helped me pass.
results.content_html: Good course. Very thorough. If you've passed other pro-level AWS exams a lot of it will be remedial. Granted, you kind of need to go through every video to get all the tips for the exam. Def helped me pass.

results.content: I have attended couple of courses from Zeal. He is a true subject matter expert (SME). With lot of hands on and labs, ample anecdotes from his past experience, quick and easy analogy, demoing both positive and negative scenarios help to grasp even the complex technology quite easily and quickly. His courses not only helped me to pass the exam, but also made me a good cloud professional at my work. Whenever I come across any doubt or hurdle at my work, I revise his lesson on that topic, and it solves almost everything. Thank you Zeal for keeping my zeal high. Wish you all the best.
